awd_titl_txt: Support for Cellular and Tissue Engineering Colloquium
awd_abstract_narration: This is a proposal to support a                                                 Colloquium on Cellular and Tissue                                               Engineering at the upcoming fall                                                meeting of the Biomedical                                                       Engineering Society.  The meeting                                               will be held on the University of                                               Virginia campus in Charlottesville                                              on October 12-14, 1991.  The                                                    research area of the Colloquium is                                              developing rapidly, it presents new                                             engineering challenges, and it has                                              the potential of achieving                                                      significant impact through the                                                  development of better health care                                               technology.  The area is also                                                   promising in the opening up of new                                              avenues for potential commercial                                                developments.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: RECTOR & VISITORS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA
